Title: Agriculture in Karnataka Part-1
Description: Agriculture was known to the Neolithic man in Karnataka. Excavations in the Tekkalakoote region in Ballari district, has yielded remains of horse gram and wheat grain from sixteenth century. Kannada literature has several references to agriculture, such as, Shri Vijayaâ€™s Kaviraaja Maarga, a text belonging to the ninth century, has allusions to rice, black pepper and sugarcane. The poetry of Pampa, the first Kannada poet of the tenth century, alludes to several flowers and fruits.
